to.description: The number of your recipient(s) separated by comma. Can be regular numbers or contact/groups from seven.

debug.description: Whether the API returns fake responses like in a sandbox

delay.title: Delay

no_reload.title: No Reload

ttl.description: Custom time to live specifying the validity period of a message in minutes
ttl.title: TTL

label.description: Custom label used to group analytics
label.title: Label

foreign_id.description: Custom foreign ID returned in DLR callbacks
foreign_id.title: Foreign ID

flash.description: Send as flash message being displayed directly the receiver's display
flash.title: Flash

from.description: The caller ID. Please use only verified sender IDs, one of your virtual inbound numbers or one of our shared virtual numbers.
from.title: From

xml.description: Whether the text is in XML format
xml.title: XML

debug.description: Whether the API returns fake responses like in a sandbox
debug.title: Debug

message.description: The message to send. Max. 1520 characters
message.title: Message

from.description: The caller ID displayed in the receivers display. Max 16 numeric or 11 alphanumeric characters.
from.title: From
